solution_line_template: They will earn {num_candied_apples} x ${price_per_apple} = $<<{num_candied_apples}*{price_per_apple}={earnings_apples}>>{earnings_apples} for the candied apples.
They will earn {num_candied_grapes} x ${price_per_grape} = $<<{num_candied_grapes}*{price_per_grape}={earnings_grapes}>>{earnings_grapes} for the candied grapes.
Therefore, Cindy and Olaf will earn ${earnings_apples} + ${earnings_grapes} = $<<{earnings_apples}+{earnings_grapes}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings} if they sell everything.
